title: Apocalypse Row
description: Carrie and her husband Phillip are planning for the future. A collapse of civilazation under the coming apocalypse to be exact. Carrie and "Sarge" are at odds about where to best survive the end of days and bring the case to Judge John Hodgman.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
